#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>

using namespace std;
#define FOR(i, n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define ll long long
ll nChoosek( ll n,ll k )
{
    if (k > n) return 0;
    if (k * 2 > n) k = n-k;
    if (k == 0) return 1;

    ll result = n;
    for( int i = 2; i <= k; ++i ) {
        result *= (n-i+1);
        result /= i;
    }
    return result;
}

int main(){
long long n;
cin>>n;
cout<<nChoosek(2*n -1 ,n);
}
